title: Federal Income Tax Calculator (Married Filing Jointly)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \mathrm{Tax} = \sum_{i=1}^{n} \left( \min\{\max(0,\, T - L_i),\, U_i - L_i\} \cdot r_i \right) \quad \text{where } T=\mathrm{Taxable\ Income}
formulas.raw: \mathrm{Tax} = \sum_{i=1}^{n} \left( \min\{\max(0,\, T - L_i),\, U_i - L_i\} \cdot r_i \right) \quad \text{where } T=\mathrm{Taxable\ Income}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted LaTeX)
formulas.latex: \mathrm{Effective\ Rate} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}}{\text{Gross Income}} \qquad \mathrm{Marginal\ Rate} = r_k \text{ where next \$1 falls}
formulas.raw: \mathrm{Effective\ Rate} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}}{\text{Gross Income}} \qquad \mathrm{Marginal\ Rate} = r_k \text{ where next \$1 falls}

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: $$\mathrm{AGI} = \max\{0,\, \text{Gross Income} - \text{Adjustments}\}$$ $$\mathrm{Taxable\ Income} = \max\{0,\, \mathrm{AGI} - \text{Deduction}\}$$ $$\mathrm{Tax} = \sum_{i=1}^{n} \left( \min\{\max(0,\, T - L_i),\, U_i - L_i\} \cdot r_i \right) \quad \text{where } T=\mathrm{Taxable\ Income}$$ $$\mathrm{Effective\ Rate} = \frac{\mathrm{Tax}}{\text{Gross Income}} \qquad \mathrm{Marginal\ Rate} = r_k \text{ where next \$1 falls}$$ where each bracket i has lower bound L_i, upper bound U_i (last bracket has U_n=\infty), and rate r_i.

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
